Functions
pmlib_cpuidle_pmmc.h File Reference
CPU Idle Configuration

This file declares the interface for PMMC CPU Idle functionality. This is a low latency power saving mode which allows fast wakeup depending on the power mode set. More...

#include <ti/drv/pm/include/pm_types.h>
#include <ti/drv/pm/include/pmmc/pmhal_pmmc.h>

Functions

pmErrCode_t PMLIBPmmcCpuIdle (void)
 Enter the CPU specified into the given low power state. More...
 
pmErrCode_t PMLIBPmmcCpuModeModify (pmhalPmmcModuleId_t moduleId, uint32_t mode)
 CPU mode modifications via PMMC for idle mode entry and wakeup. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file declares the interface for PMMC CPU Idle functionality. This is a low latency power saving mode which allows fast wakeup depending on the power mode set.
